## ParticleEmitterEventPayloads."PARTICLE\_EMITTER.SET\_TRANSPARENT" property

Emitted when the transparency of an emitted particle is set.

**Signature:**

```typescript
[ParticleEmitterEvent.SET_TRANSPARENT]: {
        particleEmitter: ParticleEmitter;
        transparent: boolean;
    };
```
